metadata.title: CVE-2024-47661 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Avoid overflow from uint32_t to uint8_t[WHAT & HOW]dmub_rb_cmd's ramping_boundary has size of uint8_t and it is assigned0xFFFF. Fix it by changing it to uint8_t with value of 0xFF.This fixes 2 INTEGER_OVERFLOW issues reported by Coverity.
